site_name: Wilderness Station - Murfreesboro Parks and Recreation

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
Acquisition record information for a new barn owl obtained in April 2024 was not available for review today. The facility
representative contacted leadership who stated that they did have the form that contains the acquisition information
required by the Animal Welfare Act regulations but the form was not able to be found in the records notebook. Accurate
recordkeeping with records available for review by APHIS officials is necessary to allow for legal and medical tracing and
for inspections to be conducted. The facility shall have available all records required to be kept by the AWA for APHIS
officials to examine. Correct by 11/20/24.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.126(a)(2) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
Acquisition record information for a new barn owl obtained in April 2024 was not available for review today. The facility 
representative contacted leadership who stated that they did have the form that contains the acquisition information 
required by the Animal Welfare Act regulations but the form was not able to be found in the records notebook. Accurate 
recordkeeping with records available for review by APHIS officials is necessary to allow for legal and medical tracing and 
for inspections to be conducted. The facility shall have available all records required to be kept by the AWA for APHIS 
officials to examine. Correct by 11/20/24. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
